betterquesting:10.desc:8:
One thing you have neglected up to this point is better methods of Enchanting. You don't want to be caught off guard by anything, so time to get to work.

Â§3Additional tools for managing enchants would be Botania's Mana Enchanter, Bibliocraft's Printing Press/Typesetting Table, and EnderIO's Enchanter. The first you can read more about in the Lexica Botania. The other two have quests in the MV and HV tabs respectively.

You can also enchant using arcane infusion, but that isn't the fastest of methods.
